Direct-TO | July 2018 <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/godirect-router]]> Everything You Ever Wanted to Know About Vertical Navigation (VNAV <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/July2018/VNAV1Jul18]]>) <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Aug2017/IRS1Aug17]]>
Part One - What is Vertical Navigation?
This multi-part series attempts to de-mystify vertical navigation on Honeywell’s Business and General Aviation avionics... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/July2018/VNAV1Jul18]]>
Inside the FMS <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/July2018/InsideJul18]]> GPS Jamming and Spoofing
Jamming, which prevents reliable GPS signals from reaching an antenna, and Spoofing, which provides a fraudulent signal to the onboard GPS, are two subjects gaining increased exposure... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/July2018/InsideJul18]]> PIREPS <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/July2018/PirepJul18]]> New Article Series and “The Case of the Missing Procedures”
Honeywell has received many questions from pilots about procedures in their navigation database for which there isn't a matching chart, and charts for which their are no matching procedures... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/July2018/PirepJul18]]>
Service Information Letter Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/July2018/SILJul18]]> Incorrect Waypoint Inserted When Activating FANS Direct TO Clearance
<[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/June2018/GoDirectJun18]]>This SIL applies to certain Gulfstream 450/550 and Embraer 170/190 aircraft when activating a FANS Direct TO clearance... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/July2018/SILJul18]]>
